p:
The apoptotic effect of compounds 18b, 19a, and 20a on MCF-7 cells was evaluated after treatment for 24 h at 0, 1, 5, and 10 µM. The assay was done using Annexin V-FITC/PI staining assay. Flow cytometry (Bechman Coulter, FC500, Brea, CA) was used differentiate apoptotic/necrotic cells from viable cells
43 .
